meta.label: AKS Cluster identity
meta.description: AKS Components identity management (control plane, kubelets)

params.name: useAKSManagedIdentity
params.label: AKS managed identity
params.description: Control plane gets a System Assigned Managed Identity handled by AKS

params.name: controlPlaneUserAssignedIdentity
params.label: Control plane user identity
params.description: Resouce ID of User Assigned Managed Identity for the control plane

params.name: useAKSManagedKubeletIdentity
params.label: AKS managed Kubelet identity
params.description: Kubelets get a User Assigned Managed Identity created and handled by AKS

params.name: kubeletUserAssignedIdentity
params.label: Kubelet user identity
params.description: User Assigned Managed Identity for the kubelets. Only available with Azure feature Microsoft.ContainerService/CustomKubeletIdentityPreview. See documentation.

params.name: attachToACRName
params.label: Attach to ACR
params.description: Name of the ACR to attach to. Syntax "[RESOURCE_GROUP/]NAME".  RESOURCE_GROUP defaults to the same as the cluster.
